description: This requirement is for: Department of National Defense (DND)",
full_summary:
# Temporary Help Services – Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Notice Information

* **Solicitation Number-numeroSollicitation**: S4469063
* **Publication Date-datePublication**: 2023-06-08
* **Tender Closing Date-appelOffresDateCloture**: 2023-06-12T15:00:00

## Tender Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defense (DND)
* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Security Level**: Enhanced Reliability

### Supply Arrangement Holders Invited

* The following Supply Arrangement (SA) holders are invited to submit a proposal:
	1. 1019837 Ontario Inc.
	2. A Hundred Answers Inc.
	3. ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC., in Joint Venture
	4. ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC
	5. AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
	6. Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
	7. Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
	8. IBISKA Telecom Inc.
	9. InfoMedia Systems Group, Inc.
	10. Maverin Inc.
	11. Olav Consulting Corp
	12. Protak Consulting Group Inc.
	13. SRA Staffing Solutions Ltd.
	14. TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
	15. TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP./SOCIÉTÉ TEKSYSTEMS CANADA

## Requirement Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services. The requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement holders under EN578-172870, qualified under streams and categories 5.1 Computer, Application Support.

The successful bidder will be required to provide temporary help services to support the Department’s operational requirements.

### Tender Submission Requirements

* Submissions must be made in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP document.
* The RFP document can be found at: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6217/s4469063-method-2---rfp-%28english-version_1
